synopsis.text: Federation, is a lone rebel from the polluted planet S-1. Reigan, armed with his robotic spacecraft, Baldios, seeks to warn Earth of an imminent invasion by the ruthless Zeo Gattler and his armada. As the people of S-1 have destroyed their own planet beyond repair, they set their sights on Earth as their new home, willing to wipe out humanity in the process. Reigan, the son of a murdered scientist, must convince the skeptical human population of the impending threat and unite with the Blue Strike Force to stand against the Red Fighters. In this epic battle for survival, can Reigan and Baldios save Earth from becoming a new home for the inhabitants of the doomed planet S-1? The fate of two worlds hangs in the balance in this thrilling space war fought on the environmental front.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
